duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate, repair, and troubleshoot equipment in Lab, Hospital, or Food Processing facilities.
Execute and oversee the implementation of site-specific procedures and emergency operation procedures.
Maintain a safe work environment and adhere to all company guidelines and OSHA safety requirements.
Perform other job-related duties as assigned by site management.
May be required to work evenings, weekends, and overtime.
Manage inventory and track supplies, equipment, tools, and machinery.
Complete rounds/inspections efficiently and detect anomalies during those rounds.

education_certification.credential: Graduate of apprentice program or trade school (Journeyman Level) or equivalent experience in a Lab, Hospital/healthcare, or food processing facility.
